word: Christ said to the cavilling Jews, \93I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life\94 (John 8:12). The very fact that Jesus spoke the truth, and that with certainty, is the reason why the Jews did not believe Him. He said, \93Because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not\94 (John 8:45).
